title: The Horseman's Dream
description: In a near-future Britain where “Great” is a distant memory, climate disaster and disease grip the gloomy, diminished archipelago, while a fascist media magnate propagandises citizens via a terrifying new broadcast technology. Meanwhile, David Hopkins, the troubled neuroscientist who invented this technology must race to prevent a state transmission that will plunge the country into a permanent nightmare. Talismanic dreams will guide him as he leads a ragged band of PTSD-stricken veterans to battle against vicious technocrats and mystical forces in a war for the very soul of a nation.A dystopian novel 20 years in the making, The Horseman's Dream will make you question everything  you think you know about reality.
author: A.J. Reid
